title: IT HAPPENED AGAIN!?!?!
body: Ok riot im very pissed off right now, this is the second time i have been disconnected from your servers while using discord and picking my champ. i had NO ISSUES until i chose my champ and then i got the  "unable to connect to servers message" Riot i do not see this as fair to get a loss twice in a row because of your servers. If there is an issue with discord and leauge servers then how is it fair that I am being punished when its clearly not a fault on my end??? This is the 2nd time withing 10 minutes in which i literally just posted a form in the miscellaneous tab. Riot please help and fix this shit because we shouldnt be getting losses or leaver busters if its something wrong with YOUR server

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having a problem staying connected to our servers, and Discord may be a coincidence.   Please check out our [Connection Issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide which Rineyy provided to get this fixed up.  If you are experiencing issues after please let me know, and we can take a deeper look.

After going a few days without playing leauge it let me connect to the servers still but half of the time i'm loading into games i get disconnected and says "unable to connect to servers" and the other half of the time it connects me no problems at all! I'm not sure why as why it does this since i already play on Ethernet connection since last year. First time this started to happen but i just bought a new computer either way and nothing has happened yet. (hope it stays this way) it was just frustrating since it happened twice in 20 minute time span as i get into my gold promos :c
